alt: Two former directors of PT Timah Tbk said they were involved in the corruption case of management team that cost the country financial Rp 300 trillion. The two former Directors of PT Timah are Mochtar Riza Pahlevi Tabrani as Director General of PT Timah Tbk for the period 2016-2021 and Emil Ermindra as Director of Finance PT Timah Tbk for the period 2016-2020.
